titleinfo.title: Indians for Indians Radio Show, February 28, 1950

mods.tableOfContents: Sam Osborne. (Other names not given). A very brief church program. Pawnee Hymns (2). Scripture verse - Mrs. Alice Moore Pawnee Hymns (5).
mods.note: When citing recordings from this collection, please using the following: Indians for Indians Radio Show. Western History Collections, University of Oklahoma Libraries.
